body:
The current race test only tests `go/vt/` and not `go/` because of [this comment](https://github.com/vitessio/vitess/blob/master/tools/unit_test_race.sh#L27-L33):
```
# TODO(mberlin): Test all packages (go/... instead of go/vt/...) once
#                go/cgzip is moved into a separate repository. We currently
#                skip the cgzip package because -race takes >30 sec for it.
```

It looks like go/cgzip was removed, so we are free to change this. When I did, it looked like there are races which were previously undiscovered:

```
E1202 14:59:18.262371   26851 server.go:320] Cannot read post-SSL client handshake response from client 1 ([::1]:59006): tls: client didn't provide a certificate
io.ReadFull(header size) failed
W1202 14:59:18.263870   26851 auth_server_static.go:195] Config parsed using legacy configuration. Please update to the latest format: {"user":[{"Password": "xxx"}, ...]}
```
